channel.title: Copter on Robin Wang
channel.description: Recent content in Copter on Robin Wang

item.title: Tricopter VTOL
item.description: A small tricopter vtol allowing for fun fixed wing FPV out of areas that lack runway space Overview This project was my introduction into ardupilots and autonomous flight. Prior to this, all my models were simple RC planes which were either entirely manually controlled or had limited flight stabilization built into the receivers. It was a steep learning curve to start with a vtol but provided an excellent teaching experience.
